page.title: 01THE SOUTH END OF WALNEY
page.content: Any glance at the O.S.map containing the Walney School block will show the dominant feature of sea.Ours is an island community -Walney Island.The survey area we dealt with is at the south of Walney Island and includes the outlying islands of Roa and Piel. Features that will make this block distinct from most others in Britain are Walney Lighthouse,Piel Castle,an Oyster Farm,Gull Sanctuaries.Roa Island also houses the local lifeboat station.This block also contains one feature that has led to the industrial development of nearby Barrow-in-Furness-Piel Deepwater Channel.This will take warships as well as pleasure craft.
